meanings.definition: To give insufficient importance or attention to something.
meanings.sent1: She underemphasized the importance of eating vegetables for good health.
meanings.sent2: The teacher underemphasized the need for studying regularly to pass the exam.
meanings.sent3: He underemphasized the significance of wearing mismatched socks to a job interview.
meanings.sent4: The coach underemphasized the value of teamwork by focusing only on individual performance.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of underemphasizing safety measures can be severe.

meanings.sent1: The underemphasized role of background music in movies can greatly impact the viewer's experience.
meanings.sent2: Her underemphasized efforts in the project went unnoticed by the team.
meanings.sent3: The underemphasized flavor of the dish left the diners craving more seasoning.
meanings.sent4: The underemphasized character in the story turned out to be the hero in disguise.
meanings.sent5: The underemphasized details in the painting revealed hidden symbols upon closer inspection.
